law.catch_line: An election for modified administration shall include:...
law.text:
An election for modified administration shall include:
A statement that the estate qualifies for modified administration;
A brief description of the property subject to administration; and
An acknowledgment that:
A verified final report under modified administration shall be filed no later than 10 months from the date of appointment; and
Distribution of the estate shall occur no later than 12 months from the date of appointment.
